subject: Junit and Log4j
msgSnippet: Hi everyone, I m having trouble figuring out how to use Junit in conjunction with Log4j for logging test results.  Does anyone have experience with this, or
messageBody:
Hi everyone,

I'm having trouble figuring out how to use Junit in conjunction with Log4j
for logging test results. Does anyone have experience with this, or with
redirecting Junit output in general?

Any help appreciated,

Matt
